subject: Tennis
Sony Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: By the end of the Sony Open tennis tournament in Key Biscayne, Fla., 71 men’s matches will have been produced for television and streaming, compared with 26 women’s matches.
snippet: By the end of the Sony Open tennis tournament in Key Biscayne, Fla., 71 men’s matches will have been produced for television and streaming, compared with 26 women’s matches.
